name: Connect TD
description:
My first submission for a game jam! (Lost Relic)

Connect TD is a tower defense game with connection in mind. You're incentivized to upgrade your towers and create the ultimate versions of each. By connecting 4 like-towers in a 2x2 area and fully upgrading them, you unlock their full potential. Some towers are more effective against certain baddies. Chains are also a method of connection in this game. The longer the chain of baddies you eliminate the larger reward you receive.

Can you reach wave 60?

CONTROLS

1-5 - Tower selection

S - Sell

U - Upgrade

Mouse - Everything else
